Comment.val: 22.03.2010 SH SCR15393 This is an old version to retrieve active jobs from iSeries.via spool files. The new version of this program is using an API (RPG) to retrieve thoese jobs, which should be much faster as the spool file solution.

Text.val: 03.07.2009 SH SCR14463 Replaced old message box "Questions" by GB007
26.04.2005 BT SCR 7935 remove table QTEMP/MGEACTJ befor create table.
11.02.2005 BT SCR 9276 remove rows for Jobs QP0ZSPWP (see SQL)
07.06.2004 BT SCR 6360 add new field and tooltip (Parameters)
06.05.2004 BT add new field in display (Jobnumber)
23.04.2004 BT SCR5998 create memory table for WRKACTJOB
09.12.2003 BT SCR 4960 display the relevant ServJob and if pressed 'ENDJOB'
Because now the Serverjob-Name and Clientjob-Name are not the same.
26.04.2005 BT SCR 7935 remove table QTEMP/MGEACTJ befor create table.

ExpSyntax.val: 'CREATE TABLE QTEMP/MGACTJ (JOB CHAR (132 ) NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT)'

Text.val: delete Server Job_original_old before the name of clientjobs are MGCLIENT:

ExpSyntax.val: MID ({0,1},1,1)='' AND {0,1}<>' MGSERVER' AND {0,1}<>' MGCLIENT' AND {0,1}<>' EASYCOMD'
'WRKACTJOB OUTPUT(*PRINT) SBS(EASYCOM MAGIC MGSRVBATCH MGSRVNIGHT QBATCH QINTER QPGMR QCTL IBOLT)'
'CPYSPLF FILE(QPDSPAJB) TOFILE(QTEMP/MGACTJ) JOB(*) SPLNBR(*LAST) TOMBR(*FIRST) MBROPT(*REPLACE) '

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT SUBSTR(JOB , 10 , 6) FROM QTEMP/MGACTJ FOR FETCH ONLY OPTIMIZE FOR 100 ROWS

ExpSyntax.val: 'SELECT SUBSTR(JOB , 2 , 15),SUBSTR(JOB , 17, 10),SUBSTR(JOB , 29, 6),SUBSTR(JOB , 116, 6),SUBSTR(JOB , 60, 2) ,SUBSTR(JOB , 95, 3) , SUBSTR(JOB , 100 , 16) FROM QTEMP/MGACTJ WHERE SUBSTR(JOB , 53, 1) = '' '' and SUBSTR(JOB , 17, 10) = SUBSTR(JOB , 38, 10)'

'SELECT SUBSTR(JOB , 2 , 15), SUBSTR(JOB , 17, 10),SUBSTR(JOB , 29, 6), SUBSTR(JOB , 111, 6), SUBSTR(JOB , 51, 3) ,SUBSTR(JOB , 85, 5) ,SUBSTR(JOB , 93 , 18) FROM qtemp/MGACTJ WHERE SUBSTR(JOB , 123, 1) = '' '' and SUBSTR(JOB , 124, 1) <> '' '' and SUBSTR(JOB , 4, 8) <> ''QP0ZSPWP'''
Trim ({3,11})&' FOR FETCH ONLY OPTIMIZE FOR 100 ROWS'
